abstract: The Connecticut attorney general said he was investigating a national labeling campaign that promotes products like Froot Loops and mayonnaise as nutritionally smart choices.
snippet: The Connecticut attorney general said he was investigating a national labeling campaign that promotes products like Froot Loops and mayonnaise as nutritionally smart choices.
lead_paragraph: Raising the stakes in the battle over nutritional claims for packaged foods, the Connecticut attorney general said on Wednesday that he was investigating a national labeling campaign that promotes products like Froot Loops and mayonnaise as nutritionally smart choices.

abstract: General Electric announced investments in two clean-technology start-ups on Wednesday as part of its strategy of focusing on ways to generate and use energy more efficiently.
snippet: General Electric announced investments in two clean-technology start-ups on Wednesday as part of its strategy of focusing on ways to generate and use energy more efficiently.
lead_paragraph: General Electric announced investments in two clean-technology start-ups on Wednesday as part of its strategy of focusing on ways to generate and use energy more efficiently.
